avdta.network.node

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.Turn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Turn>

    public class Turn
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Turn>
    This class just defines a data type to store a turn i.e. a pair of Link data-types (i and j).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
